title: Self to Lose - Self to Find
author: Marilyn Vancil
whykept: We think this is one of the better books on personality types, and we refer to it often.

title: Tattoos on the Heart
author: Gregory Boyle
whykept: I bought it to read in a book club and fell in love with the stories it contains of compassion.

title: Richest Man in Babylon
author: George S. Clason
whykept: We bought each of our kids a copy of this book because we want them to be wise with their money.

title: Five Lessons
author: Ben Hogan
whykept: We keep this book as a golfing reference book so that occasionally we can look at it and be reminded of good golfing technique.

title: Princess Bride
author: William Goldman
whykept: I saw the movie before I read the book so when I read the book, I was delightfully surprised to find details that explained some things that occur in the movie. Both book and movie are great.

title: Egermeier's Bible Story Book
author: Elsie E. Egermeier
whykept: This book came to us as a part of our homeschool curriculum. We liked gathering the kids up at night and reading a Bible story from this picture book.

title: Scholastic Dictionary of Spelling
author: Marvin Terban
whykept: This book is a quick spelling reference.

title: Essential Swimmer
author: Steve Tarpinian
whykept: We used this book to learn to swim well as adults, and we find it to be a reference.

title: DK Eyewitness Top 10 Puerto Rico
author: Christopher P. Baker
whykept: We spent last year in Puerto Rico. We kept this book to remind us of our time there.

title: Survival Guide for the Modern Drummer
author: Jim Riley
whykept: Lee got this book to learn drumming.

title: Songs for Beginners: Drum Play-Along Vol 32
author: Hel Leonard Corp
whykept: This book includes eight songs like, Another One Bites the Dust by Queen, that Lee can learn to play on his drums.

title: You and Me Forever
author: Francis Chan & Lisa Chan
whykept: We bought this book to read with our small group from church.
